팀 파일
class Calculator :
    def __init__(self):
        self.result = 0
    def mult(self,num):
        self.result *= num
<<<<<<< HEAD
    	return self.result

=======
>>>>>>> e25ce5ee17f862c9ccc4a00f68c22c9fd425de00
	return self.result

덧셈
class Add:
    def __init__(self,a,b):
        self.a = a
        self.b = b

    def add(self):
        return self.a+self.b

<<<<<<< HEAD
    def __init__(self):
        self.result = 1 
    
    def div(self,num):
        self.result /= num
        return self.result

add = Add(3,8)
result = add.add()
print('결과는', result)


add = Add(3,8)
result = add.add()
print('결과는', result)

뺄셈 
class Calculator:
    def __init__(self, first, second):
        self.result = 2
    def sub(self):
        self.result -= num
        return result 
=======
add = Add(3,8)
result = add.add()
print('결과는', result)
